dk.pervasive.jcaf
Class ContextEvent

java.lang.Object
  java.util.EventObject
      dk.pervasive.jcaf.ContextEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ContextEvent
extends java.util.EventObject

A generic event which indicates that context has been changed.

Author:
Jakob Bardram
See Also:

Method used to get the type of event.
